item.description:
Let's try Cuban Revolution as the location for the next Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour. They have a yummy food, including 20 cent wings and reasonably priced beer. Please see their website for more specifics and please note - this is the Valley Street location and there is ample parking directly across the street from the restaurant: http://thecubanrevolu....

Come out for good food, drinks and great conversation with fellow members of the Rhode Island Atheist Society!

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour(s) - Cuban Revolution in Providence!
